name: Aditya G. Parameswaran
content: | Siebel School of Computing and Data Science | Illinois Related News Illinois CS Alumni & Faculty Earn International Recognition for Recent Dissertations Parameswaran Aims for Algorithms That Would Add Perspective to the Voices From the Crowd Visual Data Exploration: A Fertile Ground for Data Management Research Nine CS Faculty and Staff Receive Engineering, Campus Awards for Excellence Parameswaran, Peng win NSF CAREER Awards Parameswaran recognized with the IEEE TCDE Early Career Award News Notes
